actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that determinations by the administration of the reasonable assurance of repayment of prospective loans be made on a case-by-case basis and to clarify the eligibility of small business homebuilding firms for assistance under the Small Business Act.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to revise the eligibility requirements for small business home-building firms for assistance under the Act. Stipulates that determinations by the Small Business Administration of the reasonable assurance of repayment of prospective loans shall be made on a case- by-case basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that determinations by the administration of the reasonable assurance of repayment of prospective loans be made on a case-by-case basis and to clarify the eligibility of small business homebuilding firms for assistance under the Small Business Act.
